reasoning:

The Jumbo Spectral Pack is worth considering at $6 since spectral cards can dramatically shift my deckâ€”Black Hole would upgrade all hands, Soul could generate a legendary joker. Magic Trick at $10 seems less critical right now since I'm already scaling well. I could also reroll the shop or just move forward to the next round.

I'll grab the Jumbo Spectral Pack. The upside potential justifies the cost, and even a mediocre spectral card adds value at this stage of the run. Then I'll head to round_select.
